main.name: Tarun Meel
main.bio: My name is Tarun Meel, and I'm a Full Stack ReactJS Developer currently working at Zextras Group. I have experience in both front-end and back-end development, specializing in creating dynamic and efficient web applications. At Zextras Group, I contribute to innovative communication and collaboration solutions, focusing on enhancing user experiences through seamless management interfaces

education.school: INDIAN INSTITUTE OF INDIA VARANASI (IIT BHU)

work.title: Front End Web Developer
work.description: Zextras Group is a technology company specializing in innovative solutions for communication and collaboration. At Zextras Group, I worked on the Admin Console UI, enabling seamless management of all user accounts using technologies such as React.js, Zustand, Webpack, Git, and RESTful APIs.

work.title: Full stack Web Developer
work.description: I started as a front-end developer and worked on various features. Later, I transitioned to a full-stack developer role and created features called 'blogs' and 'Jobs' at MachineHack. For this project, I used technologies such as TypeScript, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, Redux, and RESTful APIs

work.title: Front End Web Developer
work.description: Worked on multiple projects using React, Storybook, react-data-table, bootstrap, react-select, react-date-picker, web-pack , Type Script. Developed a User Interface of a mobile application using Ionic framework

work.title: Front End Web Developer Intern
work.description: Worked as a front end web developer to create a UI of a hotel booking website.

projects.title: Job post
projects.category: I created a job post page at my previous company, using React for the front end and Node.js for the back end.

projects.title: Blogs
projects.category: I created a blog page at my previous company, using React for the front end and Node.js for the back end.

testimonials.text: You cannot change your future, but you can change your habits, and surely your habits will change your future.
